title: Steve Racher
deck: You'll most likely find me behind the drums on a Sunday morning! I'm one of the Lifegroup leaders at Gateway. During the week I work in Leeds as an Environmental Consultant. My wife Hannah and I have lived in Acomb for about 6 years now. We have a little boy of 4 1/2 called Peter who is full of beans and keeps us busy, and we are expecting baby no. 2 in March.
